description: GroupServiceAddMemberRequest contains the information needed to add a user to a group

^(groupId)$.description: UUID of the group to which the user will be added

^(groupName)$.description: Name of the group to which the user will be added, if group_id is not provided

^(isMaintainer)$.description: Indicates whether the user should have maintainer (admin) privileges in the group

^(userEmail)$.description: The user to add to the group
